attributes.action: strongly support Keir Starmer's speech on the Human Rights Act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Keir Starmer's comments highlight the truth about the act which is that it is in the interests of every single person in Britain and fundamental to our understanding of our rights, fairness and justice.
The Prime Minister (and the public through this petition) should support Keir Starmer's comments and confirm support for the Human Rights Act and its benefits.
